message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $180 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for it.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. However, I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need $160 for the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $160 is still a bit too high for me.  Let's split the difference - I'll offer $150. If you're not willing to go lower, I might have to consider other options.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need $155 to make this sale worthwhile. Can you meet me at $155?
